website_summaries.verdict: A huge capacity refrigerator with the energy efficiency and convenience of a lower freezer.
pros: Gallon-sized bins on the door shelves
Very large capacity with the ability to store extra-wide items
Stainless steel version has an "Active" finish meant to repel fingerprints
cons: Has a built-in ice maker, but not a door unit

customer_reviews.title: We've had this for almost a month and love it. I was skeptical of the active finish ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for almost a month and love it. I was skeptical of the active finish (fingerprint resistant) but it's legit, my 2yo opens it about 9 million times a day and it's still print free! The ice maker was extremely slow at first but we looked it up and learned the freezer may need to be set to a colder setting, so my hubby adjusted it and we haven't had any more trouble. It came with plastic covering the surfaces, everything as described, arrived on time and the delivery guys hooked it up with no trouble and were very nice. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsFtz

customer_reviews.title: REFRIGERATOR STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: 3 months after delivery, it's stopped working. I guess I should have purchased a more expensive one. I will update this post when the service tech has given me an explanation. I should have purchased the 3 year warranty since I might be dealing with a defective appliance from now until the end of the next 36 months.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Broken from day 1
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered with a dent. A week later the LED panel is broken. Tech came today and it's still broken. We have a to wait on a new part and a tech to return next week. Since they don't work on weekends, I had to take multiple days off from work to be home for all these issues for a supposedly a brand new appliance to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Manning

customer_reviews.title: Deffective  upper parts, not working?
customer_reviews.text: The product was just used for two months or less and started NOT WORKING. The upper part is getting too hot, the refrigerator was a TOTAL BUST. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. Technicians says, they are overflow with back log and cannot repair due to missing parts. I paid more than a thousand bucks and I am being treated by AMAZON like a piece of junk. WALL MART will easily replace this but AMAZON does not. I want a complete replacement or return my money. I bought brand new and pay good money for it....amazon stop being an ass, I have patronized AMAZON like no other, check my history.
customer_reviews.author: JOMIND

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: I ignored all of the quality and service complaints thinking that the loud folks must be the minority. It's a Kenmore after all, right? Now I'm paying the price. Fridge quit working on Sunday. Kenmore/Amazon service will be out to fix the unit Friday! I'm just guessing that they will need a part and won't blink an eye if I go another week without a refrigerator. I couldn't regret buying this more. DON'T BUY KENMORE!
customer_reviews.author: James Martin

customer_reviews.title: I like the fridge
customer_reviews.text: I like the fridge. it's spacious enough and I like the digital temperature readout. One can adjust what temperature they would like to maintain. The previous fridge I had, you turned a dial and there was difficulty figuring out whether you set it up cold enough. I however set it up by myself though I was led to believe it would be delivered and set up. The old fridge was not picked up either as the delivery folk claimed not to be aware that they needed to pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Eric O

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 9/18. Refrigerator has failed (freezer still works) On line with "Customer Support" for over an hour. They are unwilling to help or do anything to make this right. They suggested hiring a repair person. Uncooperative, rude, and unhelpful. Last Kenmore I will ever buy especially if the Model Number starts with 111 Models are made by different companies (I think 106 is LG for instance) so my fridge, Model 111,73025.711 is made by Daewoo (to save Sears/Kenmore $$) They know about this issue, well documented on web, yet they offer nothing in the way of assistance, no help for a $1000.00 fridge that didn't last even 2 years. DO NOT BUY THIS FRIDGE
customer_reviews.author: tominsav

customer_reviews.title: best price to be found and a really nice piece ...
customer_reviews.text: silliest thing ever. buy a giant appliance on the internet. but not so silly in the end. white glove installation, best price to be found and a really nice piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Yeck

customer_reviews.title: Love my Kenmore fridge
customer_reviews.text: Love my Kenmore fridge! Was very impressed with the Amazon delivery crew as well. Those guys were so very careful and very conscious of my walls, doorways and flooring. Very professional staff!
customer_reviews.author: NorCor

customer_reviews.title: Do not order Appliances on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this refrigerator 2Years ago! Do not buy a Kenmore. I have to buy a new refrigerator again (Lowes) as the compressor went out and you cannot get the parts. I have had a hardship over this due to the corvid virus! Amazon is not answering their phones due to corvid. Wow a the owner of Amazon is a millionaire and he cannot have customer service???? I’ve learn the hard way to not order any appliances on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Dial

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent free delivery and disposal. Ample storage and controls. Works for our family.
customer_reviews.author: tenle

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator died in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. When we bought this had no idea this was not a kenmore product It was a Samsung. Who knew they made refrigerators?’ 2 years to the day the refrigerator stopped working. Now 2 visits from repair man and was told this is not a quality refrigerator. Not under warranty of course. No refrigerator should have issues after 2 years! Buyer beware! Paid 999. Not a deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy plenty of storage for food and beverages. Generous vegetable and fruit crispers. The pantry drawer is really handy for small packages of food items like cheese packs of lunchmeat etc. The refrigerator is perfectly level and the right door stays open as you are placing things in or taking out. However the left door annoyingly wants to close. Aside from the floor levelers I their does not seem to be any way to adjust this from closing whilst using the left side.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Ferko

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this fridge
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fridge. Excellent quality and super quiet. The only time you hear it is when the ice empties into the bin! The fridge itself is huge & has tons of space. The delivery people were on time & set it up very quickly & also hauled away my old fridge. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Had a month
customer_reviews.text: Will update if fails. I had a Samsung of the same design. Some of the things were the same, some were way better with Kenmore. Everything works together, the interior doors shut when you close the french doors, and the ice tray on the bottom opens when you pull the main freezer door - then shuts just where it needs to go each time. When empty, this is easy to move around. Good lights. The freezer does get too cold, if you set it that way - the Samsung never did get milk cold enough for me. Con - milk jugs barely hit the shelf and are awkward to take in and out anywhere, even in the door.
customer_reviews.author: J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge. Came with some light dents on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice fridge. Came with some light dents on the front that were hardly noticeable at first. It drives me crazy...but didn't want to deal with not having a fridge during the exchange/return period.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was super.  Great installers and took old refrigerator away.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Kenmore since I use to repair them. This is a big refrigerator with great lighting inside. Very quiet and I like the door alarm if it's open longer that a minute or if the door is not closed all the way. First time with 2 doors and full size pull out bottom tray drawer. Very spacious inside and excellent size freezer. Very happy with sight unseen purchase. Would recommend it. Couldn't rate features because they don't apply to product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Romano-Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fridge, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This fridge looks really nice compliments our kitchen nicely, looks elegant and having ice maker inside make the outside a clean nice look. I did not experience any of the issue some people reported. Ice maker make alot of ice and for having teenagers i thought it would not keep up but i was wrong i have yet to have little or no ice since i have had this fridge. Also this fridge is not noisy as others has stated only when it makes ice and this is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Works only until warranty is up
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok until 2 weeks after the 1 year warranty ran out. Then the refrigerator part stopped working. Neither kenmore nor Amazon will do anytjing about it because its past the warranty by 2 weeks!! Never making this kind of purchase from Amazon or kenmore again
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 5

customer_reviews.title: Weeks after I bought it the price dropped by 200.00 dollars.
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is great. All controls are easy to use. Plenty of room for everything. Love the pantry drawer. My 1 complaint is that less than a month later My 1299.00 fridge is now 999.00. Big difference. Very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Deb Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Icemaker failed a month after product support ended!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the refrigerator until the ice maker failed and this was just one month after the end of product support. This is extremely frustrating, now what? I spend this much money for a Kenmore refrigerator and it fails after one year and a month. Not sure where to turn at this point....
customer_reviews.author: L. Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Will be Great in the Garage
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the double door features on the refrigerator. It is roomy and can hold a lot of food. We had amazon install it after buying the product and the ice maker still does not work. We had to wait almost 2 weeks to have a repairman come to fix it, will hopefully update the review soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed. :)
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this fridge. It’s very cold, the ice cubes are a cool shape. (See photos) I haven’t had any issues so far. The reviews made me nervous, but I always have good luck with Kenmore. I love it... what else can I say? It was tricky getting it into the house. But the doors come off rather easy.
customer_reviews.author: PossessedByShoppingDemons

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator makes a horrible buzzing noise every few hours. Tried to call for a repair person to look at it. There is absolutely no warranty support. Spent 72 hours on phone calls only to get a tech support person to assure me it was needed to be unplugged and plugged back in. Problem still exists. Would. It recommend Kenmore appliances due to the lack of warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Fridge didn't last 2 years, made in Korea, professional states the interior mechanism is actually a Samsung/LG. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service with the delivery team!
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search for a refrigerator for almost two months as ours stopped working. After many delays for different reasons, I finally found this one! I will look at other Kenmore products moving forward on other appliances. This one is super quiet! And, most of all, GREAT customer service and follow ups from the delivery team in coordinating the delivery time. I am very satisfied! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Roe Rueda

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Product has stopped working two separate times and all of my food has spoiled. I have the kenmore protection plan but it has not been helpful because they have not fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Nice Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after our 3 year old LG top of the line compressor died. LG was not helpful even though the compressor has a 10 yr warranty. We found this on Amazon and checked it out at our local Sears. Ended up saving almost $200 on Amazon. Delivered, set up, and hauled away the old. It is a little noisy but super cold and makes ice at a good rate. If you are looking for a nice stainless steel refrigerator and a great price - this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meador

customer_reviews.title: Problems since day one.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look and design, but the door latch never worked from day one, and the fridge stopped working completely after 2 years. Now we’re stuck buying yet another fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Ara A Uebelhor

customer_reviews.title: Great Fridge
customer_reviews.text: For the price this refrigerator is amazing. Its got lots of room and I love that it doesn't have a water dispenser. My house has hard water and it destroyed the last water dispensing fridge. The delivery was so simple. They removed my old fridge and took it with them and installed the new fridge and were finished within an hour. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MFW

customer_reviews.title: Not a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine for 18 months I purchased the 5 year warranty and after almost 4 months of being lied to about the parts needed to repair it were not on their way.I was told to contact Amozon about a product replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Yamilet Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fridge at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to find a black bottom freezer refrigerator locally only to to be told it would take up to 3 weeks. So I figured I’d give Amazon a shot. This thing is as advertised. Plenty of space, and looks amazing. It came within 3 days and the delivery guys had it in and on in no time. I’ve had no issues at all with noise or the temperature not working it has worked great. I got it for $600 cheaper than any store in town and that was with the 4 year warranty. Very pleased I decided to try this method out!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of maintenance issues
customer_reviews.text: The fan went out after 16 months. The replacement part will take 3 months because it is coming from China. Note that this product is made overseas and replacement parts are being held hostage.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Replaced with whirlpool after a year.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy went out in half a year. Repair guy could not figure out what was wrong. Then started working. Went out again just over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer S.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty mechanisms!
customer_reviews.text: Fridge door magnet mechanism does not rotate. Freezer door handle slipped off on one side and slid down an left a huge scratch. It looks awful.
customer_reviews.author: Wallette Shealey

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge.  Easy install by amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge. Install was quick and easy all done by Amazon! Ice maker still isn’t producing but most likely just a setting I haven’t figured out.
customer_reviews.author: Carpy

customer_reviews.title: No issues food is cold
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few months and I have no complaints, working like a champ, delivery was fast, Unit is made by LG FOR SEARS. I WISH IT COULD HAVE BEEN MADE BY A USA COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: MANNIX 33

customer_reviews.title: In just one and a half years the inside fan broke
customer_reviews.text: Warranty on the fridge and all parts is for one year. This is because after a year There is a good chance it will not work or something will break. This is because it’s a piece of junk. Do not buy. We had it for one and a half years and the inside vent died already leaving the fridge warm.
customer_reviews.author: Erina

customer_reviews.title: there’s a door issue
customer_reviews.text: The doors are defective, they don’t close correctly and the alarm always goes off. Doesn’t matter how you close it, air gets in and opens the doors. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how much longer vegetables last. Very good frig. If your a super ice consumer this might frustrate you but that seems the only hitch.
customer_reviews.author: midhead

customer_reviews.title: Delivery team damaged my condo door!!!
customer_reviews.text: They removed my condo door and can not install it back. They just left this way without my acceptance of the refrigerator. I can not believe what is happening right now.
customer_reviews.author: 5tv

customer_reviews.title: frig part quit cooling but freezer works
customer_reviews.text: quit cooling after 13 months and when I called about it it will take 4 wks to get a service guy to come out to check it out
customer_reviews.author: greg pont

customer_reviews.title: Fridge Doesn’t Work.
customer_reviews.text: Made crazy weird noise as soon as we got it. Very noisy for an entire year. Refrigerator went out a year later. Freezer works but the fridge went out and we did not purchase the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaira

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after 2 and a half years.
customer_reviews.text: Was good as long as it worked. Then one day it stopped cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Returned after a few days of use
customer_reviews.text: Only made 5 ice cubes a day and didn’t have a water dispenser
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fletes

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 years old and the fridge stopped cooling.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase because Kenmore is not making replacment parts to repair when needed. Only 2 years and I will have to purchase another refridgerator. It will NOT be a Kenmore or any other brand made by Whirlpool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. The fridge is loud though and makes weird noises.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great fridge for the price. The size, finish, and ice maker for less than $1300 is awesome. The fridge is loud though and makes weird noises.
customer_reviews.author: Cizan Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Too much noise
customer_reviews.text: This fridge makes a lot of noise for the price. It makes more noise than my previous fridge that was a lot younger and had known issues.
customer_reviews.author: evelyne nikoue

customer_reviews.title: GOOD buy, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: GREAT price! We really like the three door configuration. It is substantially better than the 16 y/o GE it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: A. T. Nader

customer_reviews.title: Try ordering your next appliance from Amazon it has worked out perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge at a great price. Couldn't expect any nicer and the size and storage space seems to be perfect for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: I Won't buy Appliances from Amazon again
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator and freezer stopped working after 2 1/2 months. I called for service and was told it would be January 2 before anyone could come out to service the unit. I learned my lesson. You get what you pay for. I will stick with a local appliance dealer for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fridge
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is perfect as a second fridge and honestly even as a main fridge. The item was delivered and put together just as the purchase suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fridge, lots of space, good ice maker, easy access
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: buy the warranty and use the product 4years at that price is a great deal and there warranty on a American made name product all repair personnel I talked to will honor it . great deal for a no frills refrigerator. the crew showed up install the new, then removed the old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge for the price. Smaller dimensions than the one it replaced, but much more volume.
customer_reviews.author: Chris NY

customer_reviews.title: Elegant refridgerator
customer_reviews.text: Very nice appliance and features. Quiet operation and lots of space for food.
customer_reviews.author: Doug C. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: this fridge has a nice adjustable layout
customer_reviews.text: Had a serious issue with the delivery team not taking the old one as promised. City and local trash company wouldnt take it. So called Amazon back and 2 weeks later they picked up the old one. Grass is dead. Anyway, this fridge has a nice adjustable layout. It feels a bit cheap compared to our last GE. Lighter doors and clanking drawers. But the GE failed after 5 short years. There is an issue with food in the back of the fridge getting frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Very good experience
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. What you see in the pictures you get. Fast delivery and set up. Will never buy appliances from the store again. LOVE AMAZON..
customer_reviews.author: William Mills , Park Avenue Transportation Rockford Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Middle door flap is weak and deficient, keeps food warm :(
customer_reviews.text: Within 3 months of purchasing the middle flap on the door would not close. Causing my fridge to stay warm and this piece needs to be replaced. For the cost of this fridge, this should not be happening :(
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator makes great ice and cools well.. Time will tell it’s endurance...makes constant funny sounds..
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator door issues, don’t close properly which ends up causing it to freeze.
customer_reviews.text: The doors really suck.. They don’t close properly and refrigerator starts to freeze.. Kenmore use to make quality refrigeratorS but not anymore..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not last!
customer_reviews.text: I had it for only 2 years and it stopped cooling. Kenmore is worthless and refused to help in any way! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Helms

customer_reviews.title: Love the pantry drawer
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the Dutch door feature but don’t have a water hook up so the ice maker noise is irritating and the doesn’t seem to be a way to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Hill

customer_reviews.title: Product awesome, Delivery service, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is awesome. Exactly what I wanted. I just plugged it in waiting for it to cool. The delivery service, well, not very friendly or outgoing. They said it wouldn't fit through my front door. But yet here it sits in my kitchen, imagine that. To bad No one wants to work hard anymore.
customer_reviews.author: chris patete

customer_reviews.title: Fridge
customer_reviews.text: It makes some strange noise every once in a while. Not a lover of the black, it's hard to keep clean, but that is what was in the house.
customer_reviews.author: City of Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Great frig capacity
customer_reviews.text: I like the finish, the capacity of the frig is fantastic. The shelves and door shelves are not cheaply made. The freezer would not be suitable if I didn’t have a small freezer in my basement. BUT it does make an obnoxious noise from time to time that I will videotape and send to Kenmore. I bought the 3 year warranty plan just in case it had any glitches off the bat. Going to hold them responsible for this noise.
customer_reviews.author: susan deacon

customer_reviews.title: not Kenmore's fault, but need new delivery people
customer_reviews.text: I had to cancel, the delivery crew were impossible to work with, sent it back, even though I wanted it. I had trouble with the same crew when I purchased a Kenmore dishwasher a few months earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M Habzansky

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Spacious, easy to clean, works well, and looks amazing in our kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ahyonna

customer_reviews.title: Like but had weird noises.
customer_reviews.text: Love look however it makes weird periodic noise even though we do it use the ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Somori

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few months.....one minute the ice is melted and the next the freezer door is frozen and you can't open it. Don't buy it! I'm having a repairman come in later this week.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and roomy fridge
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and roomy fridge. I bought it didn't know what to expect but when it got home, the looks and quality is top notch. Very nice doors stainless steel and smudge resistant. Interior very roomy and wide. It comes with ice maker but I didn't installed it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Delgado

product_meta.title: Kenmore 4673025 Alexa Capabilities 04673025 26.1 cu.ft. Non-Dispense French Door Refrigerator with Active Finish, Stainless Steel, cu. ft
product_meta.description: Size:26.1 cu. ft.| Color:Stainless SteelWith the Kenmore 26.1 cubic feet French Door Refrigerator with Bottom-Freezer, not only are you getting an exceptionally well-made and reliable appliance, you're also getting an appliance that takes care of all of your family's food storage needs. You'll be amazed at the storage capacity of this large fridge. The refrigerator has dual evaporators that cool the refrigerator and freezer separately to keep each section at the ideal temperature and humidity level. For easy access to your bulkier food items, gallon-sized door bins give you space for containers of juice, milk, and taller items. The full width pantry drawer has room for extra-large items, like veggie trays and party platters. With its easy-care wipe clean exterior and interior tempered glass shelves, this French door refrigerator is a welcome addition to any kitchen space. For convenient frozen food storage, the frost-free freezer protects your frozen leftovers from freezer burn and keeps food fresher longer. You'll always have ice at the ready with a built-in ice maker. A built-in ice maker keeps fresh ice at your fingertips, so you can whip up smoothies, cocktails, and more in a flash. The French door refrigerator measures 35.38” W x 35.9” D x 68.58” H.
feature_bullets: Item includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away at checkout

26.1 cubic foot refrigerator has dual evaporators that cool the refrigerator and freezer separately to keep each section at the ideal temperature and humidity level. Full Width Pantry Drawer has room for extra large items like veggie trays and party platters.
Frost-free freezer so you frozen food stays fresher longer;Completely Separate Cooling Zones
Item dimensions are length 35.38 by width 35.9 by height 68.58 inches. Measure the available space to ensure the item will fit.

Gallon-sized door bins give you space for gallon containers of juice and milk and taller items.Depth w/ Handle (inches) :35.38. Depth w/o Handle (inches) : 33.8. Width w/ Door Closed (Inches) :35.98. Depth without Door (inches) :30.47. Depth w/out Handle (Inches): 33.8
